content.text: Seaman Recruit Ukkari is a Marine soldier who serves at the Shells Town Marine Base.
Ukkari is a short man. He wears the standard Marine uniform: a white sleeveless shirt and hat.
Like all other Marines in Shells Town, Ukkari hated and feared Captain Morgan. Ukkari became very happy when Luffy defeated Morgan.

He was first seen when he lightly scratched Morgan's statue as he was raising it up. Morgan decided to kill him for the scratch, but before Morgan was able to do so, Luffy showed up on the roof and accidentally destroyed the statue.
When Morgan was defeated, Ukkari cheered alongside his fellow Marines.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 1 Chapter 4 and Episode 2, Ukkari makes his debut.
↑  Vivre Card - One Piece Visual Dictionary, Ukkari's birthday is revealed.
↑  One Piece Blue: Grand Data File (p. 37), Ukkari's name is revealed.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 1 Chapter 4 and Episode 2, Ukkari scratches Captain Morgan's statue.
